types:type.name: SitePayload
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type SitePayload = {| SITE_STATUS: String, ASSET_STATUS: String, INACTIVE_DT_GLOBAL: Null, PROJECT_NAME: String, SITE_WID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, ASSET_NUMBER: String, CANC_PROJECT_NUMBER: Null, CANC_PROJECT_NAME: Null, SITE_NUMBER: String, PROJECT_TYPE: String, COLLO_CUSTOMER_NAME: String, CUSTOMER_EQUIPMENT_HISTORY: Null, PROJECT_WID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, PROJECT_NUMBER: String, PROJECT_STATUS: String, CUSTOMER_EQUIPMENT_STATUS: String, TENANCY_COUNT: String |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"SITE_STATUS\":\"Active\",\"ASSET_STATUS\":\"Inactive\",\"INACTIVE_DT_GLOBAL\":null,\"PROJECT_NAME\":\"Addl-Telefonica Brasil S.A-19348\",\"SITE_WID\":71893,\"ASSET_NUMBER\":\"SIT-11037905\",\"CANC_PROJECT_NUMBER\":null,\"CANC_PROJECT_NAME\":null,\"SITE_NUMBER\":\"452805\",\"PROJECT_TYPE\":\"Collocation\",\"COLLO_CUSTOMER_NAME\":\"Airtel\",\"CUSTOMER_EQUIPMENT_HISTORY\":null,\"PROJECT_WID\":71893,\"PROJECT_NUMBER\":\"BR.19348\",\"PROJECT_STATUS\":\"Closed\",\"CUSTOMER_EQUIPMENT_STATUS\":\"ON HOLD\",\"TENANCY_COUNT\":\"2\"}"}

types:type.name: AssetPayload
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type AssetPayload = {| SITE_STATUS: String, ASSET_STATUS: String, INACTIVE_DT_GLOBAL: Null, PROJECT_NAME: String, SITE_WID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, ASSET_NUMBER: String, CANC_PROJECT_NUMBER: Null, TENANCY_COUNT: String, CANC_PROJECT_NAME: Null, SITE_NUMBER: String, PROJECT_TYPE: String, COLLO_CUSTOMER_NAME: String, CUSTOMER_EQUIPMENT_HISTORY: Null, PROJECT_WID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, PROJECT_NUMBER: String, PROPERTY_KEY: Number {"typeId": "int"}, PROJECT_STATUS: String, CUSTOMER_EQUIPMENT_STATUS: String, ASSET_KEY: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"SITE_STATUS\":\"Active\",\"ASSET_STATUS\":\"Active\",\"INACTIVE_DT_GLOBAL\":null,\"PROJECT_NAME\":\"DELETED-EB Usage Approval - India-11-08-2018\",\"SITE_WID\":173185,\"ASSET_NUMBER\":\"SIT-600054\",\"CANC_PROJECT_NUMBER\":null,\"TENANCY_COUNT\":\"2\",\"CANC_PROJECT_NAME\":null,\"SITE_NUMBER\":\"445324\",\"PROJECT_TYPE\":\"EB Approval\",\"COLLO_CUSTOMER_NAME\":\"Vodafone\",\"CUSTOMER_EQUIPMENT_HISTORY\":null,\"PROJECT_WID\":173185,\"PROJECT_NUMBER\":\"12249537\",\"PROPERTY_KEY\":3538429,\"PROJECT_STATUS\":\"Active\",\"CUSTOMER_EQUIPMENT_STATUS\":\"Real\",\"ASSET_KEY\":10925322}"}
